recipe.title: Mulled Cider with Winter Spices
ingredients: Peel (orange part only) from 1 orange, cut into strips
instructions: Mix first 10 ingredients in large saucepan. Bring to boil. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer mixture 30 minutes to blend flavors. Strain mulled cider into mugs. Serve cider, passing applejack brandy separately, if desired.
